text: 9.21 Apo 8.3, Gal 1.13, 1.23 Anɨgɨl agñek, binɨb mɨdupsek nɨŋɨd ju dɨlɨg agɨlak, Bɨ anɨb awl, binɨb Jisas nop agnɨŋɨd yɨb nop apal okok, kɨlop gɨ tɨmel golɨgup, man Jelusalem agɨlak? Chɨn nɨŋɨd apun akaŋ agɨlak? Mɨñɨl ogɨnap sek nag lɨl, dam Jelusalem bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl okok kɨlop ñin agɨl owup tek lup agɨlak.
